summary: Read, update, write and delete data from NocoDB.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the type of authentication to access NocoDB (API Token or User Token).

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Select the API version to use for NocoDB operations.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to interact with (Row or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: Select the workspace by name or ID for version v0.200.0 onwards.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Select the base by name or ID for version v0.200.0 onwards.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the project for API versions before v0.90.0.
